meanings: (맞서 이겨 내다) match, (어려운 상황 등을) cope with

vlive.korean: 제일 무서워했던 사람 - 기억이 안 나 - 저도 헹가래 처음 당해 아니, 뭐야... Who was scared the most? - I can't remember. - It was the first time I was tossed... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 헹가래의 끝은 안드로메다🚀
vlive.english: Who was scared the most? - I can't remember. - It was the first time I was tossed...

vlive.korean: 이혼을 당해? She divorced me? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 니들 나한테 용사따윈 바라지 마라![넘버식스]ep8.
개쪽 한 번 당해보시겠어요? Would you like to fall for it? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 누나 집에서 회 먹고 갈래? [가두리횟집] TEASER
vlive.english: Would you like to fall for it?

vlive.korean: 이사 간다는데 이게 거절 당해도... To move... To get rejected... 듣기 View video ITZY : 류진이의 왓어원더풀나잇💙
교통사고... 저도 당해봐서 아는데 정말... Traffic accident... I've been one. 듣기 View video NCT : 천지의 고민상담소

examples.korean: Everyone was roped in to help with the show. 발음듣기 모든 사람들이 설득을 당해 그 쇼를 돕게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Everyone was roped in to help with the show. 발음

examples.korean: Whales are still being hunted and killed in the Arctic. 발음듣기 북극에서는 아직도 고래들이 사냥을 당해 목숨을 잃는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Whales are still being hunted and killed in the Arctic. 발음

examples.korean: She was bribed into handing over secret information. 발음듣기 그녀는 매수를 당해 비밀 정보를 넘겨주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was bribed into handing over secret information. 발음

examples.korean: Many treasures were lost when the tombs were raided in the last century. 발음듣기 지난 세기에 그 무덤들이 침입을 당해 많은 보물이 분실되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many treasures were lost when the tombs were raided in the last century. 발음

examples.korean: I have never been so insulted in my life! 발음듣기 내 평생 그런 모욕은 당해 본 적이 없어요! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I have never been so insulted in my life! 발음
